Some experiments and visualizations
===================================
- with sorting algorithms for float numbers: sorts_for_floats_
- with sorting algorithms for integer numbers: sorts_for_integers_
- visualization of merge_sort: merge_sort_
- visualization of count_sort: count_sort_
- notebook for creating visualization gifs: visualization_

.. _sorts_for_floats: sorts_for_floats.ipynb
.. _sorts_for_integers: sorts_for_integers.ipynb
.. _merge_sort: merge_sort_visualization.html
.. _count_sort: count_sort_visualization.html
.. _visualization: Visualizations.ipynb
